entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 2:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: NNE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of ice pellets or freezing rain or flurries early this afternoon. Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain and a few flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain and a few flurries changing to light snow mixed with ice pellets this evening. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 1:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
